Name: Blazing Extinction
Desc:
The mischievous Flame Fox creates a fireball of compressed heat and sends a powerful blast of heat forward for a while.
Use with the Down key to activate the Blazing Extinction - Lion mode. Lock the command to disable the Blazing Extinction - Lion mode when using this skill with the Down key.
A Fire Element attack. Cooldown Reset effect is not applied.
Command Lock: Right-click
